name: Attack On Titan: Potato girl in action
name_original: Attack On Titan: Potato girl in action
description:
This game is based on anime called"Attack On Titan"

I made this on scratch , I convert my Sb3 file to EXE file so you can play it offline without a browser needed.

(This is just little fun low effort game that I made on scratch) 

You can play the original game here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/709254185/

If your PC can't run scratch game , go to this link  --> https://turbowarp.org/709254185

or you can play it here:
